solution_line_template: The number of peaches planted is three times the number of apricots which is {peach_multiplier}*{apricot_trees_planted} = <<{peach_multiplier}*{apricot_trees_planted}={peach_trees_planted}>>{peach_trees_planted}
In total, the family planted {peach_trees_planted}+{apricot_trees_planted} = <<{peach_trees_planted}+{apricot_trees_planted}={total_trees_planted}>>{total_trees_planted} trees
